remarks: The set of traces of lattice translations for a fiducial co-atom ` W ` .  (Contributed by NM, 20-May-2012.)
statement:
trlset.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
trlset.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
trlset.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
trlset.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
trlset.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
trlset.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
trlset.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
trlset.r $e |- R = ( ( trL ` K ) ` W ) $.
trlset $p |- ( ( K e. C /\ W e. H ) -> R = ( f e. T |-> ( iota_ x e. B A. p e. A ( -. p .<_ W -> x = ( ( p .\/ ( f ` p ) ) ./\ W ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d A p $.
$d B x $.
$d K f p x $.
$d T f $.
$d W f p x $.
